skill.name: nano-banana-blockrun
skill.description: Nano Banana by BlockRun - Generate images using Google's Nano Banana via x402 micropayments. Use when the user asks to generate, create, draw, or make images. Pay-per-request via USDC on Base, no API keys needed.
skill.summary: Nano Banana by BlockRun - Generate images using Google's Nano Banana via x402 micropayments. Use whe...
skill.author: BlockRunAI

security_audit.summary: Legitimate image generation skill using x402 micropayments. Private keys are used only for local EIP-712 signing with signatures transmitted, not keys. No obfuscation or exfiltration patterns detected.

content.user_title: Generate images with Google Nano Banana
content.value_statement: Need AI-generated images without API keys? Use Google Nano Banana with simple USDC micropayments on Base. Pay per image, no subscriptions required.
actual_capabilities: Generate images using Google Nano Banana model (1024x1024, ~$0.05)
Generate images using Google Nano Banana Pro (up to 4K, ~$0.10)
Save generated images to specified output directory
Handle USDC payments via x402 protocol on Base network
limitations: Requires USDC balance on Base network for payments
Only supports specified models (Nano Banana, Nano Banana Pro, DALL-E 3)
Payment amounts vary based on model and resolution selected

use_cases.title: Quick AI images
use_cases.description: Generate social media visuals without managing API keys or monthly subscriptions

use_cases.title: Code-integrated art
use_cases.description: Add image generation to Python scripts with simple SDK integration

use_cases.title: On-demand prototypes
use_cases.description: Create concept images rapidly with pay-per-use pricing for iterative design work

prompt_templates.title: Basic image request
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate an image of a sunset over mountains with orange and purple sky

prompt_templates.title: Character illustration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a portrait of a friendly robot character with blue eyes and metallic silver body

prompt_templates.title: Scene composition
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a futuristic cityscape at night with flying vehicles, neon lights, and tall glass skyscrapers

prompt_templates.title: Product visualization
prompt_templates.prompt: Show a minimalist coffee mug on a wooden table with steam rising, warm lighting

output_examples.input: Generate an image of a cute cat wearing a space helmet

best_practices: Start with simple prompts and refine iteratively for best results
Save images to a dedicated output directory for organization
Keep sufficient USDC balance on Base to avoid interrupted generation
anti_patterns: Avoid extremely long prompts that may confuse the model
Do not share your BLOCKRUN_WALLET_KEY with anyone
Avoid generating multiple high-resolution images without checking balance

faq.question: Which AI models are supported?
faq.answer: Google Nano Banana (1024x1024), Google Nano Banana Pro (up to 4K), and OpenAI DALL-E 3.

faq.question: What is the cost per image?
faq.answer: Nano Banana costs ~$0.05, Nano Banana Pro costs ~$0.10, DALL-E 3 costs ~$0.04-0.12 per image.

faq.question: How do I add USDC to Base network?
faq.answer: Bridge from Ethereum using bridge.base.org or buy on Coinbase and withdraw to your Base wallet.

faq.question: Is my private key safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Your key is used only for local EIP-712 signing. Only the signature is sent to the server.

faq.question: Why am I getting payment errors?
faq.answer: Check your USDC balance on Base network and ensure BLOCKRUN_WALLET_KEY is set correctly.

faq.question: How is this different from DALL-E or Midjourney?
faq.answer: No API keys required. Pay-per-image via crypto micropayments. Uses x402 protocol for automatic payments.
